verses.verse: Out of the depths <S%H4615><s%> I have cried <S%H7121><s%> to you, <S%H3068><s%> Yahweh.
Lord, <S%H136><s%> hear <S%H8085><s%> my voice. <S%H6963><s%> Let your ears <S%H241><s%> be attentive <S%H7183><s%> to the voice <S%H6963><s%> of my petitions. <S%H8469><s%>
If you, <S%H3050><s%> Yah, kept a record <S%H8104><s%> of sins, <S%H5771><s%> Lord, <S%H136><s%> who could stand? <S%H5975><s%>
But there is forgiveness <S%H5547><s%> with you, <S%H3372><s%> therefore you are feared.
I wait <S%H6960><s%> for Yahweh. <S%H3068><s%> My soul <S%H5315><s%> waits. <S%H6960><s%> I hope <S%H3176><s%> in his word. <S%H1697><s%>
My soul <S%H5315><s%> longs for the Lord <S%H136><s%> more than watchmen <S%H8104><s%> long for the morning; <S%H1242><s%> more than watchmen <S%H8104><s%> for the morning. <S%H1242><s%>
Israel, <S%H3478><s%> hope <S%H3176><s%> in Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> for with Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> there is loving kindness. <S%H2617><s%> With him is abundant <S%H7235><s%> redemption. <S%H6304><s%>
He will redeem <S%H6299><s%> Israel <S%H3478><s%> from all their sins. <S%H5771><s%>
